column4: I installed the fglrx drivers for my ATI Radeon 9600 video card, and it worked once, but now every time I try to set it with gksu displayconfig-gtk , it restarts, and tells me it can't detect my video card and monitor. every time I tell it to pick Radeon and Samsung, it forgets.
It keeps defaulting to ati - somethingsomething[none of which are my video card]... [more stuff that I can't read and can't scroll to read]
don't know, but gksudo is the command to run GUI apps as root.
